title: UFO Disclosure - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/21/22
itunes:title: UFO Disclosure - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/21/22
description:
George Noory and researcher Stephen Bassett explore his efforts to push for UFO disclosure, discuss recent congressional hearings to determine if UFOs pose a threat to national security, and when government will admit they have known about the existence of UFOs for decades.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
